{'content_type': 'image_asset_pointer', 'asset_pointer': 'file-service://file-NZoUUCCNpgdfipDYUHfGCEEC', 'size_bytes': 1202056, 'width': 1220, 'height': 958, 'fovea': None, 'metadata': None}
can you recreate this table using markdown?

Certainly! Below is a recreation of the table using Markdown:

```markdown
| EPC (Design & Built) Contract |           | WET TEAM | FALAH & NOVA TEAM |
|-------------------------------|-----------|----------|-------------------|
| ACTIVITIES                    |           |          |                   |
| Concept Engineering & Design Drawings |   | P        | R & A             |
| BOQ (bill of quantities) Estimating |     | P        | R & A             |
| Develop Cost (Budget of Project) Estimating | | R    | P                 |
| Preparation of the offer     | JOINT EFFORT EACH PARTY TO DO THEIR OWN |          |                   |
| Detailed Design & Drawings of Civil Works | | P        | R & A             |
| Detailed Design & Drawings of MNE |       | P        | R & A             |
| Detailed list of Equipment   |           | P        | R & A             |
| Detailed Planning (time) monitoring |     | R        | P                 |
| Supervision of Construction Work |       | R        | P                 |
| Procurement / Equipment      |           | R        | P                 |
| Legal & Contractual Matters (Contract) |  | R        | P                 |
| Finance                      |           | -        | P                 |
| Coordination & Communication with Client | | R        | P & C             |
| Construction of Civil Works  |           | R        | P & C             |
| Construction of MNE Works    |           | R        | P & C             |

| Legend |                     |
|--------|---------------------|
| P      | Primary Responsibility |
| R      | Review Responsibility |
| A      | Approval Responsibility |
| C      | Coordination        |
```

When rendered, this will display the table as seen in the image you've uploaded, with the appropriate responsibilities assigned to the WET TEAM and the FALAH & NOVA TEAM. Please note that Markdown does not support merged cells or vertical text, so "JOINT EFFORT EACH PARTY TO DO THEIR OWN" is placed under the 'Preparation of the offer' row, spanning the two columns for the teams.
reprint the table so i can paste it into excel

Certainly! For pasting into Excel, you would want the data in a tab-separated format which Excel can interpret correctly. Here is the table in a format that can be copied and pasted into Excel:

```
EPC (Design & Built) Contract		ACTIVITIES	WET TEAM	FALAH & NOVA TEAM
		Concept Engineering & Design Drawings	P	R & A
		BOQ (bill of quantities) Estimating	P	R & A
		Develop Cost (Budget of Project) Estimating	R	P
reprint the table, the markdown didn't show up properly

I apologize for the confusion. Here's the table in Markdown format again:

```markdown
| EPC (Design & Built) Contract                    | WET TEAM | FALAH & NOVA TEAM |
|---------------------------------------------------|----------|-------------------|
| **ACTIVITIES**                                    |          |                   |
| Concept Engineering & Design Drawings             | P        | R & A             |
| BOQ (bill of quantities) Estimating               | P        | R & A             |
| Develop Cost (Budget of Project) Estimating       | R        | P                 |
| Preparation of the offer                          | JOINT EFFORT EACH PARTY TO DO THEIR OWN |                   |
| Detailed Design & Drawings of Civil Works         | P        | R & A             |
| Detailed Design & Drawings of MNE                 | P        | R & A             |
| Detailed list of Equipment                        | P        | R & A             |
| Detailed Planning (time) monitoring               | R        | P                 |
| Supervision of Construction Work                  | R        | P                 |
| Procurement / Equipment                           | R        | P                 |
| Legal & Contractual Matters (Contract)            | R        | P                 |
| Finance                                           | -        | P                 |
| Coordination & Communication with Client          | R        | P & C             |
| Construction of Civil Works                       | R        | P & C             |
| Construction of MNE Works                         | R        | P & C             |
| **Legend**                                        |          |                   |
| P = Primary Responsibility                        |          |                   |
| R = Review Responsibility                         |          |                   |
| A = Approval Responsibility                       |          |                   |
| C = Coordination                                  |          |                   |
```

This Markdown table should properly recreate the visual structure of the table from your image. However, remember that certain visual elements, like cell merging, color, and the positioning of the 'JOINT EFFORT EACH PARTY TO DO THEIR OWN' note (which spans multiple columns), might not render exactly as in traditional spreadsheet software.
